## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/evaluator">Evaluator</a></>}>
This class evaluates LLVM IR, producing the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> representing each SSA instruction. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/evaluator/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/evaluator/mutablevalue">MutableValue</a></>}>
The evaluator represents values either as a Constant&#42;, or as a MutableAggregate, which allows changing individual aggregate elements without creating a new interned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/evaluator/mutablevalue/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evaluator/mutableaggregate">MutableAggregate</a></>}>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is used to detect recursion.  In pathological situations we could hit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exponential behavior, but at least there is nothing unbounded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;Function&#42;, 4&gt;</a> CallStack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For each store we execute, we update this map.  Loads check this to get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the most up-to-date value.  If evaluation is successful, this state is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// committed to the process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;GlobalVariable &#42;, MutableValue&gt; MutatedMemory;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// To &#39;execute&#39; an alloca, we create a temporary global variable to represent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// its body.  This vector is needed so we can delete the temporary globals</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>, 32&gt; AllocaTmps;</span></CodeLine>
